raw_response_obj.response:
To proceed from the Exercise room, you have the option to go south. Based on the given format, your next instruction would be:

```json
"action": "GO: south", "graph": {...}
```

This indicates that you are moving from the Exercise room to the room located to the south of it. The graph will be updated with the new nodes and edges that represent the path you have taken and the rooms you have visited. If you reach a point where there are no more rooms to visit, you would then respond with "DONE" to signify the completion of the task.
